price: 112. (Al-lah) les preguntará: “¿Cuántos años vivieron en la tierra?”.
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
